mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book_shop.order_prod ( ord_seq, isbn, prod_type_code, ord_stat, deli_stat, pay_stat, item_quan, point_perc, point_pric, basic_pric, bene_perc, bene_pric, sale_pric, ord_pric, reg_date, reg_id, up_date, up_id ) VALUES ( #{ord_seq}, #{isbn}, #{prod_type_code}, #{ord_stat}, #{deli_stat}, #{pay_stat}, #{item_quan}, #{point_perc}, #{point_pric}, #{basic_pric}, #{bene_perc}, #{bene_pric}, #{sale_pric}, #{ord_pric}, NOW(), #{reg_id}, NOW(), #{up_id} )
mapper.select: SELECT ord_prod_seq, ord_seq, isbn, prod_type_code, ord_stat, deli_stat, pay_stat, item_quan, point_perc, point_pric, basic_pric, bene_perc, bene_pric, sale_pric, ord_pric, reg_date, reg_id, up_date, up_id FROM book_shop.order_prod WHERE ord_prod_seq = #{ord_prod_seq}

SELECT ord_prod_seq, ord_seq, isbn, prod_type_code, ord_stat, deli_stat, pay_stat, item_quan, point_perc, point_pric, basic_pric, bene_perc, bene_pric, sale_pric, ord_pric, reg_date, reg_id, up_date, up_id FROM book_shop.order_prod

SELECT ord_prod_seq, ordProd.ord_seq, isbn, prod_type_code, ordProd.ord_stat, ordProd.deli_stat, ordProd.pay_stat, ord.userId, item_quan, point_perc, point_pric, basic_pric, bene_perc, bene_pric, sale_pric, ord_pric, ordProd.reg_date, ordProd.reg_id, ordProd.up_date, ordProd.up_id FROM book_shop.order_prod ordProd JOIN book_shop.order ord ON ordProd.ord_seq = ord.ord_seq
AND ord.userId = #{userId}
